item.title: Advent
item.description: Starting in 2020, I’ve made it a personal goal to complete Advent of Code in a new language every year.

item.title: Authmap
item.description: Shortly after opening up my home server’s ssh port to the world (with only public/private key auth enabled), I started getting a flood of attempted ssh requests from all over the place.

item.title: Generative Art
item.description: Mag Field # Inspired by E/H-field diagrams and built using numpy and pycairo.
